DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi-center study compare bioavailability RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) administration auto-injector versus pre-filled syringe healthy volunteer . Healthy volunteer receive single dose RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) . The anticipated time study duration 28 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Administration RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Auto-injector Vs. Pre-filled Syringe Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , age 18 65 year inclusive Intact normal skin without potentially obscure tattoo , pigmentation , lesion area intend injection A body mass index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 inclusive Volunteers know active current history recurrent bacterial , viral , fungal , mycobacterial infection A history clinically significant gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , cardiovascular , allergic disease
